imdb.plot outline: How do you define something that, by definition, has no rules and won't easily be defined? That's exactly what "OnCreativity" sets out to do. OnCreativity is a series of short, informal interviews with a diverse range of designers, artists, musicians, animators, educators, etc. It explores a single topic: Creativity. With the differing points of view expressed by each person in their own words, OnCreativity hopes to inspire, confuse, provoke and delight. From Academy Award-nominated filmmaker Bill Plympton to original Mad Man, George Lois, internationally known graffiti artist (and founder of KRINK) KR to world-renowned graphic designer Milton Glaser, OnCreativity asks a specific set of questions to a wide range of people and looks for patterns. Each person's story and relationship to creativity is unique, all of their stories and observations are intimate and insightful.
imdb.title: OnCreativity
plot: Explores creativity, through interviews with a diverse range of well known designers, artists, musicians, animators, educators, and more.::Superfad

How do you define something that, by definition, has no rules and won't easily be defined? That's exactly what "_OnCreativity_ (qv)" sets out to do. _OnCreativity_ (qv) is a series of short, informal interviews with a diverse range of designers, artists, musicians, animators, educators, etc. It explores a single topic: Creativity. With the differing points of view expressed by each person in their own words, _OnCreativity_ (qv) hopes to inspire, confuse, provoke and delight. From Academy Award-nominated filmmaker Bill Plympton to original Mad Man, George Lois, internationally known graffiti artist (and founder of KRINK) KR to world-renowned graphic designer Milton Glaser, _OnCreativity_ (qv) asks a specific set of questions to a wide range of people and looks for patterns. Each person's story and relationship to creativity is unique, all of their stories and observations are intimate and insightful.::producers
